tool.name: CNVkit Coverage
tool.description: Calculate coverage in the given regions from BAM read depths.
tool.command: ln -s '$input_bam_file' ./tumor.bam && samtools index ./tumor.bam 2>&1 || echo 'Error running samtools index for indexing bam file for CNVkit' >&2 && ln -s '$input_interval_bed' ./capture.split.bed && #if $reference_source.fasta #if str($reference_source.ref_selector) == 'history': ln -s '$reference_source.fasta' ./genome.fa && samtools faidx ./genome.fa 2>&1 || echo 'Error running samtools faidx for indexing fasta reference for CNVkit' >&2 && #else ln -s '$reference_source.fasta.fields.path' ./genome.fa && cp '${reference_source.fasta.fields.path}.fai' ./genome.fa.fai && #end if #end if #import os #set galaxy_slots = os.getenv("GALAXY_SLOTS", 4) cnvkit.py coverage ./tumor.bam ./capture.split.bed --output '$output_setting.output' --processes $galaxy_slots #if $count --count #end if --min-mapq $min_mapq

param.name: count
param.label: Get read depths by counting read midpoints within each bin

param.name: min_mapq
param.label: Minimum mapping quality score to count a read for coverage depth

tool.help: Calculate coverage in the given regions from BAM read depths.
